title: Scan surrounding nodes
content: From the starting node, we take all of the surrounding nodes. This is the first step in creating a tree from the graph. This first set of surrounding nodes is called the frontier

title: Check the first node
content: Once we have scanned all of the nodes, we then check the first one to see if it's the final (goal) node

title: Restart from last node
content: From each of the frontier nodes we then scan the surround nodes. This creates another layer in this tree that we're creating
